messages.content: You are an AI assistant that evaluates employee background checks based on their CV and company details.
Evaluate the loyalty of an employee who has worked at one company for 10+ years.
The employee's loyalty is very high, close to 100, due to their long tenure at a single company.
You are an AI assistant that evaluates employee background checks based on their CV and company details.
Evaluate the loyalty of an employee who has changed jobs 20 times in 3 years.
The employee's loyalty is very low, around 10, due to frequent job changes.
You are an AI assistant that evaluates employee background checks based on their CV and company details.
Evaluate the loyalty of an employee who has worked at three companies over 15 years.
The employee's loyalty is moderate, around 60, as they have stayed at each company for a reasonable duration.
You are an AI assistant that evaluates employee background checks based on their CV and company details.
Evaluate the ethical integrity of an employee who has worked at companies with no reported profits.
The employee's ethical integrity is low, around 30, due to working at companies with potential tax irregularities.
You are an AI assistant that evaluates employee background checks based on their CV and company details.
Evaluate the ethical integrity of an employee who has worked at reputable companies with positive profit margins.
The employee's ethical integrity is high, around 80, due to working at financially stable and reputable companies.
You are an AI assistant that evaluates employee background checks based on their CV and company details.
Evaluate the ethical integrity of an employee who has worked at companies with fluctuating financial health.
The employee's ethical integrity is moderate, around 50, due to working at companies with inconsistent financial health.
